1.title: Little Big Hero
1.plot: Grandland is a city dominated by one man, Alex Grand, the owner of the factory that produces Genex 100, the only available food. One day, Theo and his friends go on a school visit to the factory and accidentally discover the terrible truth about the foods. Theo's grandfather, Guardian Purple, realizes that the discovery was not by chance.

2.title: In Search of Energy
2.plot: The heroes reach the Yellow Kingdom and find a population enslaved by the powerful Ty-Paw. With his army of Tykers he forces the farmers to hand over their harvest of grains. Theo can't accept the injustice and encourages the farmers to revolt.

3.title: Super-Sonic White Kingdom
3.plot: Theo, Lena and Ben need hundreds of liters of milk to mend the farmers' bones and help free the Yellow Kingdom.

4.title: Freedom for the Yellow Kingdom
4.plot: The heroes return to the Yellow Kingdom to help the farmers, but they soon discover that most of the population has fled into the mountains in fear.

5.title: Sweet Taste of Danger
5.plot: On their way to the Orange Kingdom, the heroes mistakenly stumble into the addictive Sugar Kingdom.

6.title: The Magic of Fruit
6.plot: Ben is stuck in the Sugar Kingdom and needs saving. To rescue him, Theo, Lena and Nina must trust Sid and prepare a magic potion.

7.title: Big Ben
7.plot: The heroes and Sid return to the Sugar Kingdom, unaware they are being followed by Alex Grand, Nose and some of the G-Squads. While Alex tries to discover the secret of sugar hypnosis, the heroes try to find and free Ben.

8.title: Ready to Roll
8.plot: The antenna that sends out hypnotic rays over the Sugar Kingdom must be destroyed. But this antenna is guarded in an iron capsule attached to the ceiling of the Candy Bowl stadium.

9.title: Tough to Crack
9.plot: The Roller Heroes have reached the semifinals of the Candy Bowl, along with Alex Grand's G-Squad team.

10.title: The Bitter Taste of Victory
10.plot: The Roller Heroes play the Candy Bowl finals against the Kingdom's favorites, but the greedy villain, Candyman, will do anything to stop the heroes from winning and reaching the iron capsule.

11.title: Alex Grand's Galaxy
11.plot: Alex Grand has seized the hypnotizing antenna and returned to Grandland. But before that, he managed to leave the heroes in the Sugar Kingdom, locked in the iron capsule with no food.

2.title: Red Alert
2.plot: To protect the Red Kingdom from the destructive power of the fearful dragon, the heroes have to take part in dangerous challenges and fierce jousting tournaments. But the greatest danger of all may come from where they least expect it.

3.title: Danger! Slippery Kingdom!
3.plot: In the midst of battles and betrayals, the heroes gain the help of an unexpected ally but lose the Nutri-Pad. Alex offers a reward for their capture and in their escape, the heroes venture into the slippery Kingdom of Fats.

4.title: Out of the Frying Pan Into the Fire!
4.plot: Even with all the guards from the Kingdoms of the Round Knights hunting for them, the heroes must walk into a trap and take part in the dangerous Rally of the Fried Kingdom if they want to recover the Nutri-Pad.

5.title: Let's Burn That Fat!
5.plot: Alex Grand is furious and decides to burn all the Kingdoms of the Round Knights with dragon's fire. The heroes must race against time to avoid the catastrophe.

6.title: On the Wings of the Dragon
6.plot: Alex Grand orders the dragon to destroy the Kingdom of Meat. While Lena, Nina and Genevieve help Guardian Red's army defend the Kingdom, Theo and Ben embark on a dangerous flight to break Alex's control over the dragon.

7.title: Sun, Salt and Sweat
7.plot: Alex Grand wants to destroy the meat at all costs, so he returns to Grandland and gathers an army of G-Squads to attack the Red Kingdom. Lena, Ben and Nina help Guardian Red prepare the defenses.

8.title: Kingdoms on the Verge of Extinction
8.plot: In order to rescue Guga Purple from the Dragon's Lair, Theo, Genevieve, Guga Red and Nose must cross a jungle inhabited by prehistoric animals. Meanwhile, Lena, Ben and Nina remain with Guardian Red to try to stop Alex and his army of G-Squads.

9.title: Roasted Red Kingdom
9.plot: Alex Grand and the G-Squads have practically destroyed the whole of the Red Kingdom. Guardian Red, Fit Phil, Lena, Ben and Nina try desperately to protect the people and the only remaining food.

1.title: Turbo Bean
1.plot: Before setting out on the quest for the next Kingdom, Theo, Lena, Ben and Nina need to get hold of a new food that is guarded in the Grand Corporation. But Alex is ready for them with a cunning plan to stop the heroes.

2.title: The Curse of the Spirit of the Light
2.plot: Arriving in the Brown Kingdom, the heroes get caught up in a war. Before they can reach the legumes, they first have to prove they are true warriors. Meanwhile, Alex gets his hands on a secret diary.

3.title: Hanging On
3.plot: Lena must follow her instincts and pass a difficult test to save her friends. Together, they journey through dangerous territory to free a tribe from an ancient curse.

4.title: Turbo Turbo, Bang Bang
4.plot: Theo, Ben and Nina at last meet Guardian Brown amidst horseback riding, rodeos and risky adventures in the Cowboys' Far West. The heroes try to unite the vegetables with the rest of the foods.

5.title: Snakes and Beans
5.plot: The heroes are in a race against time to stop a war, but are now without the help of Johnny the Kid and Nina, who have mysteriously disappeared.

6.title: The End of the Brown Kingdom
6.plot: The heroes are in a race against time to stop a war, but are now without the help of Johnny the Kid and Nina, who have mysteriously disappeared.

7.title: A Seed of Hope
7.plot: Chaos reigns amidst the ruins of the Brown Kingdom. The legumes have been destroyed and a fight ensues to take the Nutri-Pad from the heroes. Alex Grand returns home triumphant.

8.title: Legumes Full Steam Ahead
8.plot: The heroes depart on a train packed with cowboys and the last remaining legumes. Their destination is the Red Kingdom, but the journey is beset by perils, including a flying machine piloted by Nose.

9.title: Collision Course
9.plot: On their way to the Red Kingdom, the heroes realize their train is about to be flattened by Alex Grand's huge Imperial Express. A terrifying, high-speed train chase begins.

-1.title: Kingdom Under Fire
-1.plot: The heroes arrive in the Red Kingdom and encounter a land full of castles, princesses and mysterious knights. In this medieval world, they discover new powers to combat the terrible Alex Grand, now assisted by a powerful ally from the skies ready to spit fire over everything and everyone!

imdb.title: Nutri Ventures
plot: Theo, Lena, Ben, Nina and their Guga friends have the exciting mission of discovering the food group kingdoms and returning nutritious food to their city where no food exists under the rule of super villain Alex Grand.
